attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please lead by example by making a commitment to drastically reducing energy consumption in public sector buildings.  Public buildings often have heating controlled remotely, resulting in heating to such excess that doors/windows are left open and air conditioning units are used throughout winter.  Buildings are badly insulated and designed.  As part of green policies, please address this huge area of wastage of both energy and public funds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
